column6: • John Gallaway rejected Miracleman's new world, rejected companionship, rejected love - until the night Miraclewoman visited him... • The schoolyard rebels strut their stuff and debate the teenage idol of The Golden Age, Johnny Bates, in "Trends." • Miracleman explores deeper into Infra-Space in "Retrieval." • Including material originally presented in MIRACLEMAN (1985) #18, plus bonus content.
